participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and social, enjoys engaging with others despite working from home.
participant_1.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i watch too much tv in spare time. i have never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Caring and protective, shows a strong bond with her pet and has unique interests.
participant_2.background: i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.

content.text: If there's no one there, I'm leaving
I've got work to do. I work in the US Postal Service
